participant_1.name: David Lawson
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, with a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: My wife is a breast cancer survivor. I am a zookeeper. I have trained over 20 types of animals. I work with my wife.

participant_2.name: Luna Bell
participant_2.personality: Whimsical and imaginative, often lost in her thoughts.
participant_2.background: I believe I hear voices. I collect toys wearing little rain coats. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with others. I am lusting after the neighbor pool boy. I enjoy mystery flavor cake.
